articles.title: Party, State Commendations Awarded to Participants in 3rd Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under KPA in Presence of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Party and State Commendations Awarded to Participants in 3rd Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under KPA
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of awarding party and state commendations to the participants in the 3rd Meeting of Activists of Fisheries under the Korean People's Army (KPA) took place at the conference room of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on Dec. 28.
					 Present there was Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Also present there were commanding officers of the KPA. 
					
					 Prior to the ceremony he made a speech.
					
					 Exemplary officials and fishermen in the fisheries under the KPA present in the conference room of the Party Central Committee in Dec. 2013, Dec. 2014 and Dec. 2015 are the heroes of this conference room, he said, adding: The fact that you review the year's work and receive new tasks here every year eloquently shows that the fishing campaign is the issue directly linked with the combat preparations of the People's Army and the improvement of the people's living standard.
					
					 We made sure that exemplary officials and fishermen in the fisheries under the KPA were invited to be present at the conference room of the WPK and given thanks and let them receive the blessings of the whole country because we hold dear the pure conscience with which you have worked hard in the sea rain or shine in order to carry out the behests of the great leaders, standing firm on the one front of the revolution when the country is under a hard and difficult situation and, at the same time, we felt the need to encourage everybody to learn from you.
					
					 The remarkable successes made in the East and West Seas of Korea added patriotic passion and joy to yourself and parents who sent their beloved sons and daughters and families across the country, he said, noting that he harden the conviction that if they work in this spirit, all the units of the KPA and families of the whole country would be filled with the sea flavor of socialism in the near future and that a new history of big fish haul could be created without fail.
					
					 The party and the country will always remember the officials and fishermen under the KPA, the creators of the history of big fish hauls, who have devotedly implemented the fishery policy of the party by working heart and soul after accepting it as an immutable truth and faith, he said, adding that he provided this opportunity of meeting and encouraging the comrades, shaking the hands of new innovators and awarding orders and medals to them as early as possible despite the pressure of time.
					
					 He called upon the officials and fishermen in the fisheries under the KPA to hit the goal set by the Party Central Committee and unfailingly realize the wishes of the great leaders who worked heart and soul to provide the service personnel and people with plenty of fishes, deeply aware how important their posts are and how great the party's trust and expectation are.
					
					 He set the goal to be hit by the fisheries under the KPA next year and specified the tasks and ways to do so.
					
					 The East and West Seas of Korea are like great battle fields without gun fire for defending our party, ideology and social system, he said, calling for resolutely shattering the moves of the hostile forces to isolate and stifle the DPRK, the forces which do not want to see us live well and prosper, through successful fishing operations and making hurrah for socialism and the Workers' Party heard from the dinner tables of the service personnel and people.
					
					 He earnestly called for devoting all wisdom and passion to bringing  earlier the day when "Song of Big Fish Haul" is sung in the seas of the socialist country reporting signal successes in fishing operations and all posts and the families across the country are pervaded with sea flavor of socialism. 
					
					 Vice Marshal of the KPA Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, read out a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un awarded party and state commendations to the participants in the meeting.
					
					 He had a picture taken with the participants with the building of the WPK Central Committee for a background.

articles.title: Participants in 3rd Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under KPA Feted
articles.content:
Participants in 3rd Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under KPA Feted
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the Mokran House on Tuesday in honor of the participants in the 3rd Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Present there were the participants in the meeting.
					
					 Among those present were Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik and officials of the ministry of the people's armed forces.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA made a speech at the reception.
					
					 He said that Marshal Kim Jong Un invited officials and fishermen in fisheries under the KPA to visit Pyongyang again and repeatedly bestowed upon them immense honor and happiness.
					
					 This loving care is associated with the profound fatherly love shown by the Marshal for the fishermen under the KPA who devoted themselves to the drive for implementing the party's fishery policy in rough seas, he noted.
					
					 He called for working new miracles in the fishing campaign and thus proudly greeting the 7th Congress of the WPK, the mother party.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Visits Tree Nursery
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Visits Tree Nursery
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the Central Tree Nursery under the Ministry of Urban Management.
					 Going round various parts of the nursery, he called for cultivating trees of good species needed for city beautification true to the noble intention of Marshal Kim Jong Un to green the whole country by translating the behests of leader Kim Jong Il into a reality.
					
					 He referred to the issues of putting the sapling production on a high scientific, industrial, intensive, automated and mechanized basis and thus turning the nursery into a space- and manpower-effective nursery.
					
					 He also visited the Wonsan Shoes Factory, where he called for boosting the production of shoes liked by the people with locally available raw materials.

articles.title: National Meeting Held to Celebrate Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of KPA Supreme Commandership
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Celebrate Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of KPA Supreme Commandership
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held in Pyongyang Tuesday on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Present there were Hwang Pyong So, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Pak Yong Sik and other officials of the party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, participants in the 3rd Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under the KPA, persons of distinguished services, generals and officers of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of institutions and industrial establishments and labor innovators in the city.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, made a report.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA was the greatest fortune of the country and the nation and a great revolutionary auspicious event to be specially recorded in the history of the Juche-oriented army building, he said, adding:
					
					 The Korean people have carried on the struggle, holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the supreme commander of the Korean revolutionary armed forces over the past four years. This represents a proud period in which the might of Songun Korea advancing, convinced of final victory, has been fully demonstrated.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, most perfectly possessed of all qualities and qualifications as an illustrious commander, accompanying leader Kim Jong Il during journeys for Songun revolution from long ago, has worked heart and soul to firmly defend and carry forward and develop President Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's idea of army building and their feats.
					
					 Thanks to the energetic ideological and theoretical activities of the respected Supreme Commander and his leadership over army building, the Party's monolithic commanding system has been established in the entire army and the KPA has invariably preserved the revolutionary character of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army, the army of  Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's style.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the iron-willed brilliant commander who bolsters up the KPA as a-match-for-a-hundred army equipped with the Juche-oriented strategy and tactics, war method and powerful striking means.
					
					  Under the leadership of the great Songun brilliant commander, our revolutionary armed forces have rounded off at a high level the combat readiness to wipe out enemies at a single stroke in any form of operations and battles including ground, air, naval and underwater operations. 
					
					  As the Supreme Commander made a solemn declaration at a significant event celebrating the 70th anniversary of the WPK, our revolutionary armed forces are capable of coping with any form of wars chosen by the U.S. imperialists and are fully ready to firmly defend the sky of the country and the people's security.
					
					 Our armed forces which have grown stronger despite the tempest of history will always demonstrate their might as a treasured sword for preserving peace on the Korean Peninsula and in Northeast Asia and winning the final victory of Songun Korea.
					
					 The powerful revolutionary Paektusan army will never remain a passive onlooker to the enemies' reckless actions. If they dare ignite a war, our armed forces will resolutely wipe out the U.S. imperialists, the cesspool of all kinds of injustice and evils, and their allies and achieve the final victory.
					
					 The reporter called for carrying on the dynamic struggle to build a thriving socialist nation, achieve the independent reunification of the country and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the uplifted banner of Songun, rallied close around the WPK Central Committee headed by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: State Merited Chorus Gives Performance
articles.content:
State Merited Chorus Gives Performance
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- A performance of the State Merited Chorus was given at the People's Theatre Tuesday to celebrate the 4th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Watching the performance were workers and officials of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex and working people in the city.
					
					 Put on the stage that began with "Ode to General Kim Jong Un" were colorful numbers like female solo and male chorus "Honor of Life", male chorus "Our March" and mixed chorus "People Are beside Marshal".
					
					 The performers sang of leadership feats of Kim Jong Un ushering in history of great change and victory by leading the army and people of the DPRK along the only road of independence, Songun and socialism which were taken by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il all their lives.
					
					 Other numbers like orchestra "Fly High, Our Party Flag" and female solo and male chorus "Song of Big Fish Haul" gave truth impression of the true picture of the country turning into a paradise of the people and a happy life of the people under the care of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The performance ended with orchestra and male chorus "We'll Travel One Road Forever" reflecting the pledge of the army and people to follow Kim Jong Un's leadership for long.

articles.title: Celebration Meeting of Workers and GFTUK Members Held
articles.content:
Celebration Meeting of Workers and GFTUK Members Held
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- A meeting of workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) took place at the Cultural Hall of the Ministry of Railways Tuesday on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the GFTUK, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that it was a historic event that provided a sure guarantee for achieving a final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche that the service personnel and people held Kim Jong Un in high esteem as supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the greatest-ever general as he possesses perfect personality and qualifications as brilliant commander and fully demonstrates the seasoned leadership ability as illustrious commander.
					
					 He took deep care of the work of the GFTUK and led it step by step to make it fully display its mission and duty as reliable helper and defender of the Party.
					
					 The revolutionary exploits performed by him would shine forever in the history of the country as he has developed the People's Army into invincible revolutionary Paektusan army and ushered in the greatest heyday of prosperity on this land.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Organizations
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Organizations
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from the Osaka Citizens Solidarity Demanding Earlier Normalization of the Relations between Japan and DPRK and the Japan Nagano Prefectural People's Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea on Tuesday on the occasion of the fourth anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Corps
articles.content:
Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Corps
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on the New Year, Juche 105 (2016).
					 They were handed over to DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong by Brazilian Ambassador to the DPRK Roberto Colin on Tuesday.
					
					 On the same day, a floral basket and a congratulatory letter to Kim Jong Un from the economic and commercial councilors corps here was conveyed to an official concerned on the occasions of the 4th anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the New Year.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Members of the UNDP, WHO and UNICEF missions here visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Tuesday on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 105 (2016).
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Socialist Emulation for Increased Production Reviewed
articles.content:
Socialist Emulation for Increased Production Reviewed
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- A 2015 socialist emulation for increased production in the field of pomiculture was reviewed.
					 Officials and agricultural workers of the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm, the Kosan Combined Fruit Farm and those in the field of pomiculture of Kwail and Pukchong counties achieved many successes through the dynamic socialist emulation for decisively raising the per hectare fruit yield, thereby putting the fruit production on a more modern, scientific and intensive basis.
					
					 A meeting of reviewing the emulation took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were Kwak Pom Gi, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Chol Man, vice-premier and minister of Agriculture, officials of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea, officials concerned and agricultural workers.
					
					 A certificate of commendation and rotating pennant were awarded to the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm.
					
					 Basic outlines of a 2016 socialist emulation for increased production were announced there.

articles.title: Revolutionary Museum of Kim Chaek University of Technology Opens
articles.content:
Revolutionary Museum of Kim Chaek University of Technology Opens
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- A revolutionary museum was newly built and opened with due ceremony at Kim Chaek University of Technology Tuesday.
					 The university founded by President Kim Il Sung after the liberation of the country and developed into a combined base for training able technicians under his deep care turned into the best centre for training talented scientists and technicians required by the IT revolution thanks to leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un gave a steer to the university so that it could play an important role in developing the country's science and technology, as intended by the great leaders.
					
					 The new revolutionary museum is another centre of ideological education for helping the teaching staff, employees and students of the university and other working people deeply grasp, defend and glorify the leadership exploits of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu generation after generation.
					
					At the end of the ceremony, the participants looked round the museum.

articles.title: Relay Group of Young Vanguard Passes through North Hwanghae Province
articles.content:
Relay Group of Young Vanguard Passes through North Hwanghae Province
 Sariwon, December 29 (KCNA) -- Loyal members of the relay group of young vanguard passed through North Hwanghae Province.
					 They arrived in Sinphyong County of the province on Dec. 22.
					
					 They were greeted by Pak Thae Dok, chief secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Im Hun, chairman of the North Hwanghae Provincial People's Committee, Jo Jun Hak, chairman of the North Hwanghae Provincial Rural Economy Committee, and other officials concerned, working people and school youth and children.
					
					 The red flag was handed over to members of the relay group of the province at Toum-ri, Sinphyong County.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets and made bows before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Sariwon City and the mosaics depicting their beaming images in significant places.
					
					 They visited the Phyongam Revolutionary Site, the youth work-team of the Phyongam Cooperative Farm and the Singok Revolutionary Museum.
					
					 They joined youth and students in the province in holding an oath-taking meeting.
					
					 They visited the Sariwon Essential Foodstuff Factory, North Hwanghae Provincial Library, the Migok Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City and other places of the city.
					
					 At Songrim City they went round different production processes of the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex.
					
					 During the journey they held various political and cultural events.

articles.title: Renewed Looks of Pyongyang for This Year
articles.content:
Renewed Looks of Pyongyang for This Year
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The looks of Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, has undergone a radical change this year, with a number of edifices built in different parts.
					 The Sci-Tech Complex took its shape on Ssuk Islet in the River Taedong in a short span of time, displaying the will of the DPRK to outpace the world by dint of science.
					
					 Mirae Scientists Street appeared on the bank of the River Taedong, consisting of apartment houses for thousands of families and over 150 welfare service facilities.
					
					 The edifices also include the Pyongyang Home for the Aged and the Terminal of Pyongyang International Airport.
					
					 The Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace was splendidly remodeled to meet the needs of the present times.
					
					 Jangchon area in Sadong District turned into a highly-civilized rural town arranged with modern dwelling houses and service facilities.
					
					 And such industrial establishments were built or renovated as Pyongyang City Mushroom Farm, Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory and Pyongyang Catfish Farm.
					
					 Parks and pleasure grounds in streets were bettered with new species of turf and flower and fruit trees planted, while many apartments and public buildings were coated with tiles and paints of various colors.
					
					 Over 150 settling ponds were repaired and an embankment project was carried along the banks of the River Taedong, renewing the looks of the city.

articles.title: Many Medical Scientific Achievements Made
articles.content:
Many Medical Scientific Achievements Made
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has witnessed hundreds of medical scientific achievements more this year than last year, said Ryu Yong Chol, a department director of the Ministry of Public Health.
					 Typical of them are the development of medical software "Myonguiwon" and establishment of distance surgery aid system and epidemic observation and information system throughout the country.
					
					 Meanwhile, the production processes of the Myohyangsan Medical Appliances Factory were put on a CNC basis and monitoring system installed at the Mycin Shop under the Sinuiju Mycin Factory, Samjiyon Koryo Medicine Pharmaceutical Factory and Huichon Koryo Medicine Pharmaceutical Factory.
					
					 Many medical books, including "Clinical Study of Mammary Diseases", were also made public this year.
					
					 Foreign participants in the WHO Southeast Asia Regional Workshop on Traditional Medicine held in Pyongyang expressed their interest in Koryo medicine which is playing an important role in promoting public health.

articles.title: No One Can Match Tremendous Might of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No One Can Match Tremendous Might of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- It is becoming all the more obvious that the Korean Peninsula is the biggest hotspot in the world owing to the dangerous military operations and arms buildup stepped up by the Obama administration this year in pursuance of the pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy and the moves to knock into shape the triangular military alliance involving the U.S., Japan and south Korea.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 Even under such situation peace and stability on the peninsula, the DPRK's sovereignty and people's happiness have been firmly defended. This is the shining fruition and victory gained by the Korean people by their own efforts.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have turned out as one in the struggle to defend the country this year, thereby successfully defusing the danger of a war on the peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK has firmly defended its dignity and sovereignty, revolutionary gains and people's happiness by its efforts despite the tempest of history in which it has got neither help nor sympathy from anyone.
					
					 It has protected the people's life and happiness and made a new history of great turn on this land by itself despite the imperialists' harsh sanctions and pressure and severe natural disaster.
					
					 The DPRK has preserved peace on the peninsula and translated the people's ideal into a shining reality and brought them happiness this year despite the U.S. imperialists' escalating moves to ignite a nuclear war thanks to the tremendous military muscle, nuclear deterrent for self-defence being its pivot.
					
					The inexhaustible mental power displayed by the Korean people this year, nuclear deterrent for self-defence and ever-stronger single-minded unity would have been unthinkable without the outstanding leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un represents the might of the DPRK.

articles.title: Former American Drone Controllers Disclose U.S. Human Rights Abuses: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Former American Drone Controllers Disclose U.S. Human Rights Abuses: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Four former drone controllers who served the U.S. Air Force sent an open protest letter under joint signature to Obama, the secretary of Defense and the CIA director to denounce the Obama administration for murdering lots of innocent people including children and women in several regions of the world through drone strikes under the pretext of "war on terrorism", according to the American website Truthdig.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday terms the letter a declaration of conscience which disclosed and denounced the nature of U.S. which paints injustice as "justice" and commits all sorts of human rights abuses. The commentary goes on:
					
					 The drone war being waged by the U.S. is a bloody war of genocide and cruel human rights abuses, in actuality.
					
					 The U.S. is the matchless kingpin of human rights abuses and worst human rights criminal state as it takes pleasure in aggression wars and holocaust in different parts of the world.
					
					 It was reported that the above-said controllers already knew what pressure and hardships in their lives they would face in the future and sent the letter.
					
					 It is a common practice in the U.S. that a person who indicts his or her employer for corruption is never employed by the other. The former controllers were employees who were paid to be sent to the battlefield by the government, the employer.
					
					 The Obama regime should not go after solving the non-existent "issue on the human rights" of others but make apologies for its human rights abuses and pay a due price for them.

articles.title: Minju Joson Calls for Bringing U.S. to Int'l War Criminal Tribunal
articles.content:
Minju Joson Calls for Bringing U.S. to Int'l War Criminal Tribunal
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Recently, the south Korea-U.S. joint investigation group announced the results of the investigation into the case of the introduction of live anthrax germ into the U.S. military base in south Korea. According to it, the U.S. forces present in south Korea staged tests of bio-chemical weapons 15 times from 2009 to 2014 after introducing the anthrax germ samples into their base in Ryongsan. It also introduced pest germ into south Korea.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The fact proves what a reckless phase the U.S. imperialists' moves to exterminate the Korean nation have reached.
					
					 The U.S. has prepared bio-chemical warfare on the Korean Peninsula since the Korean war in the 1950s in wanton violation of international law in a bid to realize its ambition for dominating the whole of the peninsula.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. raised a hue and cry over the non-existent "threat of bio-chemical weapons" from the north in order to cover up its criminal bio-chemical warfare.
					
					 The U.S. had better clearly understand that it can neither conceal nor justify its preparations for bio-chemical warfare against the Korean nation.
					
					 The criminal nature of the U.S., empire of evils, has been brought to light before the world as it is working hard to inflict a nuclear disaster on the Koreans and even mount an attack on them with biological weapons in order to realize its wild ambition for world supremacy.
					
					 The U.S. should be brought to the international war criminal tribunal and it must face a stern punishment.

articles.title: Purpose of Chongwadae's Cabinet Reshuffle Revealed
articles.content:
Purpose of Chongwadae's Cabinet Reshuffle Revealed
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Chongwadae of south Korea partly reshuffled the Cabinet recently. Announcing the reshuffle list, Chongwadae talked a lot about "economic upturn" and "people's living" as if it would do much to them.  
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says:
					
					 The Cabinet reshuffle is just politicking of the vampire-like fat cats of south Korean ruling conservative quarters to bleed the toiling people white.
					
					 The purpose of the reshuffle is only to win more seats at the upcoming parliamentary election by taking advantage of the division of opposition camp and realize the ambition for staying in power and thus revive "yusin" dictatorship at any cost. It is by no means meant to "vitalize economy" or improve "people's living."
					
					 Timed to coincide with the reshuffle, the ruling "Saenuri party" launched an election campaign before any others.
					
					 A leopard can't change its spots.
					
					 No matter how frequently the high-ranking officials of the Cabinet are reshuffled, the conservative regime can never change its unpopular rule.
					
					 The regime can never put under carpet its unpopular nature no matter how many times the eligibility of the newly appointed fat cats is verified.
					
					 As long as such unpopular tycoons are in power, the south Korean people can never live a good life.

articles.title: S. Korean People Oppose Introduction of "State-compiled" History Textbooks
articles.content:
S. Korean People Oppose Introduction of "State-compiled" History Textbooks
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- 3 374 south Korean people filed a suit with the "constitutional court" against the introduction of the "state-compiled" textbooks on Dec. 22, according to south Korean Newsis.
					 In this regard a press conference took place outside the "constitutional court" that day under the sponsorship of the Network for Checking Introduction of State-compiled Textbooks and the Bar Association for Democratic Society.
					
					 Speakers said the introduction of "state-compiled" history textbooks is an act of encroaching upon the elementary human rights and freedom.
					
					They urged the "constitutional court" to make a correct judgment.

articles.title: MBC Side's Moves to Stamp out Trade Unions Assailed
articles.content:
MBC Side's Moves to Stamp out Trade Unions Assailed 
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The chief of the headquarters of the MBC of the Press Trade Union of south Korea and the chiefs of branches of regional broadcasting services held a rally in Seoul on Dec. 22 to denounce the moves of the MBC side to stamp out trade unions.
					 Attending it were the chairman of the Press Trade Union, the chiefs of headquarters in Seoul region under major press trade unions including KBS, SBS, CBS, OBS and YTN and other trade unionists.
					
					 Speakers denounced the MBC side for unilaterally ordering the full-timers of the trade unions to return to work in the middle of wage negotiations with the MBC headquarters.
					
					 The chairman of the Press Trade Union said the MBC side banned the trade union activities of the full-time unionists, not content with cracking down on workers demanding unbiased broadcasting.
					
					 He urged the MBC to withdraw the "working hour exemption" system and ensure the activities of full-timers of the trade unions.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Peruvian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Peruvian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Nov. 28-Dec. 28 issue of the Peruvian newspaper Accion Nacionalista carried a special write-up illustrated with a photo of leader Kim Jong Il standing on the tribune of honor of Kim Il Sung Square on the occasion of the 24th anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 The newspaper said in its article titled "Kim Jong Il's patriotism":
					
					 Kim Jong Il, whom the Korean people are holding in high esteem as eternal leader, is a model of genuine patriot.
					
					 One can know well about his ardent patriotism through the devoted efforts made by him to defend Korean-style socialism and build a thriving nation.
					
					 He dedicated his all to the country's prosperity and people's happiness.
					
					 He not only defended the country but also ushered in the new era of the national prosperity.
					
					 He made a long journey for field guidance despite his pent-up fatigue though he was in serious illness.
					
					 Thanks to his superman energy and dedication the DPRK could emerge a satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state and provide a solid foundation for the powerful self-supporting national economy.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Hungarian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Hungarian Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Comrade Kim Jong Il was the peerless patriot who protected the fate of the country and nation with his invincible Songun politics and brought about a radical phase for Korea's reunification.
					 Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party, said this in an article titled "Ushering in a fresh era of independent reunification" he dedicated to the Hungarian newspaper Liberation on Dec. 22.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Il devoted all his energies to the accomplishment of the Korean nation's reunification.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il made sure that the monument inscribed with the signature President Kim Il Sung, founding-father of socialist Korea, made on a document related to the national reunification in the last period of his life was erected at Panmunjom, symbol of the national division, in order to hand down the President's exploits for national reunification for all ages.
					
					 With his Songun revolutionary leadership Kim Jong Il frustrated every move of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK and ignite a new war.
					
					 He provided the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration and thus ushered in the new era of By Our Nation Itself, the new era of independent reunification. These are the exploits to be specially recorded in history of the Korean nation.
					
					 He will always be alive, revered by the Korean people and the progressives.

articles.title: Seminar Held by German Organizations for Study of Juche Idea
articles.content:
Seminar Held by German Organizations for Study of Juche Idea
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar by the German National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea was held in Berlin on Dec. 11 on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were the chiefs and members of the German National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the German Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il, the Hannover Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea under the national committee. Officials of the DPRK mission in Germany were present there on invitation.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Torsten Schoevitz, chairman of the national committee who doubles as chief of the German Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il, and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il defended socialism with his unique Songun politics and gave field guidance all his life to build a socialist paradise on the land of the DPRK admired by the world.
					
					 They said that he published works such as "Socialism Is a Science" in the closing years of the last century when the socialist movement faced grave difficulties due to moves of the imperialist allied forces and thus indicated the road to be followed by the progressives and led the socialist cause to victory.
					
					 They noted that he achieved the invincible single-minded unity of the leader, party and masses more powerful than nuclear weapons and turned the DPRK into a matchless power and socialist fortress.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Brazil, Germany, Sweden and Iceland from Dec. 11 to 17 to remember leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and art pieces depicting them and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The chairman of the Brazilian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il praised his revolutionary life for the country's prosperity and people's happiness, saying that he left the great exploits guaranteeing the eternal foundation and rosy future of socialist Korea as the heritage.
					
					 The chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association said that Kim Jong Il defended the country's sovereignty, people's well-being and peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula with his Songun politics and aroused the Korean people to the struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and made great contributions to the cause of national reunification.
					
					 The secretary general of the Iceland-Korea Friendship and Cultural Society said that Kim Jong Il will always be alive in the hearts of all people as he performed the undying feats for the Korean revolution and the cause of human independence.
					
					 Messages to Marshal Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings held in Brazil, Germany and Sweden.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un participa en ceremonia de premiacion estatal
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un participa en ceremonia de premiacion estatal
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 28 en la sala de reuniones del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea la premiacion del partido y el Estado a los participantes en la III reunion de activistas de la rama pesquera del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tomo parte en la ceremonia.
					
					Estuvieron presentes alli tambien los miembros de mando del EPC.
					
					Antes de la premiacion, el Mariscal pronuncio un discurso.
					
					Los funcionarios y pesqueros ejemplares de la rama pesquera del EPC quienes vinieron a esta sala de reuniones del CC de Partido en diciembre de 2013, del ano pasado y de este ano son los duenos de esta sala, dijo.
					
					Asevero que cada ano, ellos hacen en este lugar balance de los trabajos y reciben nuevas tareas, lo cual demuestra evidentemente que la captura de peces deviene un asunto relacionado directamente con la preparacion de combate del EPC y la mejora de vida del pueblo.
					
					Prosiguio que invito a ellos a la sala de reuniones del CC del PTC para expresarles agradecimiento y darles felicitaciones de todo el pais. 
					
					Cuando el pais sufre las dificultades, -acoto- ustedes dedicaron su conciencia pura en el mar sin hacer caso de los dias lluviosos y nevados para materializar los legados de los grandes lideres en un frente de la revolucion. Para mi es muy preciosa esa alma de ustedes y quiere que todas las personas la siguieran, puntualizo.
					
					Los exitos sorprendentes logrados este ano en los Mares Este y Oeste dieron mas el entusiasmo patriotico y la alegria a los padres que enviaron sus hijos al EPC y a las familias de todo el pais, dijo y continuo: Estoy convencido de que si avanzamos con este impetu podremos llenar del perfume del mar socialista en todas las unidades del EPC y las familias de todo el pais y escribir sin falta la nueva historia del mar de oro.
					
					Nuestro partido y patria nunca olvidaran a los funcionarios y pescadores de la rama pesquera del EPC, precursores de la creacion de la historia de mar de oro, quienes tomando como veracidad y conviccion absolutas la politica pesquera del partido dedicaron toda su abnegacion para materializarla, subrayo.
					
					Continuo que preparo hoy esta oportunidad dejando atras todos los asuntos para animarlos lo mas pronto posible a ellos y tomar la mano de nuevos innovadores y ponerles las ordenes y medallas.
					
					Enfatizo que los funcionarios y pesqueros de la rama pesquera del EPC deben avanzar con alta velocidad por la ruta definida por el CC del PTC teniendo bien presente de que cuan importantes son sus puestos de trabajo y cuan grandes son la confianza y esperanza del partido en ellos mismos para solucionar sin falta los deseos de los grandes lideres quienes dedicaron todos sus esfuerzos para ofrecer abundantemente los pescados a nuestros soldados y habitantes.
					
					El Mariscal presento la meta a ser conquistada en la rama pesquera del EPC en el ano proximo y aclaro detalladamente las tareas y los remedios para su realizacion.
					
					Los mares Este y Oeste son el campo de gran batalla sin detonaciones para defender a nuestro partido, nuestra idea y nuestro regimen, senalo y exhorto a frustrar con los grandes exitos de la produccion maritima las tentativas de las fuerzas hostiles, que no desean nuestra vida rica y prosperidad, para aislar y aplastar a la RPDC y a hacer que se suenan los vitores del socialismo y del PTC primeramente en la mesa de comidas de los soldados y los habitantes.
					
					Llamo fervorosamente a luchar con valentia dedicando toda la inteligencia y pasion para adelantar los dias cuando se repercuta altamente la cancion "Cancion de abundante pesca en el mar" en los mares del pais socialista convertidos en el mar de oro y se llenan del perfume del mar socialista en todos los puestos y las familias del pais.
					
					El vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, dio lectura al decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					El Mariscal otorgo personalmente las condecoraciones del partido y el Estado a los participantes en la reunion.
					
					Seguidamente, tomo la foto de recuerdo junto con los participantes tomando por el fondo el edificio del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Premier averigua labores de Almaciga Central
articles.content:
Premier averigua labores de Almaciga Central
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, estudio en el terreno las labores de la Almaciga Central del Ministerio de Urbanismo.
					En varios lugares de viveros, subrayo la necesidad de cultivar muchos arboles de buena variedad, necesarios al embellecimiento de la ciudad, en pleno acato al noble proposito del Mariscal Kim Jong Un de cubrir de todos los montes por los arboles segun el legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Menciono los problemas que se presentan en la realizacion perfecta de la cientifizacion, la industrializacion, la intensificacion, la automatizacion y la mecanizacion de la produccion y en el acondicionamiento de la almaciga como un centro economico en el uso de la tierra y la mano de obra.
					
					Por otra parte, el premier recorrio la Fabrica de Zapatos de Wonsan donde enfatizo en que esta fabrica impregnada de las hazanas directivas de los grandes Hombres sin par hay que realizar el principio de utilizar las materias primas y los materiales en la fabrica y de producir mucho mas los zapatos de buena calidad convenientes al gusto de los habitantes.

articles.title: Acto central por dia de nombramiento de Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo de EPC
articles.content:
Acto central por dia de nombramiento de Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo de EPC
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 29 en esta capital el acto central por el 4o aniversario del nombramiento del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Asistieron alli Hwang Pyong So, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Pak Yong Sik y otros cuadros, funcionarios de los organismos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, participantes en la III reunion de activistas de la rama pesquera del EPC, ameritados, oficiales y soldados del EPC y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, funcionarios e innovadores laborales de los organismos, fabricas y empresas en la capital.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC, Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC. 
					
					El informante dijo que el nombramiento del Mariscal como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea fue maxima fortuna de la patria y la nacion y gran jubilo revolucionario a ser registrado en letras especiales en la historia de la construccion del ejercito de tipo jucheano. 
					
					A lo largo de 4 anos orgullosos se ha manifestado plenamente el poderio de la Corea del Songun que marcha con la fe en la victoria final bajo la guia del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un, subrayo y continuo:
					
					Desde hace mucho tiempo, el Mariscal estuvo en el camino de la revolucion Songun junto con el Dirigente Kim Jong Il encarnando mas perfectamente todas las cualidades del comandante e hizo ingentes esfuerzos por defender con firmeza y desarrollar la idea y las proezas de los grandes Lideres antecesores en materia de la construccion del ejercito. 
					
					Gracias a sus energicas actividades ideo-teoricas y su direccion sobre la construccion del ejercito, se ha establecido en todo el ejercito el sistema de direccion unica del partido y el EPC defiende invariablemente el caracter revolucionario del ejercito del monte Paektu.
					
					El Mariscal es el general de acero quien fortalece el EPC como invicto ejercito armado con autoctonas estrategias y tacticas, metodos de combate y poderosos medios de ataque. 
					
					Bajo la orientacion del gran General Insigne del Songun, las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC han perfeccionado en alto nivel los preparativos de combate capaces de aniquilar en un instante a los enemigos en las operaciones aereas, maritimas, acuaticas y otros combates de toda indole. 
					
					Como el Comandante Supremo declaro con solemnidad, en su discurso pronunciado en el acto de festejo del aniversario 70 de la fundacion del PTC, que las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias coreanas pueden estan totalmente preparadas para responder a cualquier tipo de guerra que desea el imperio estadounidense y defender con firmeza el cielo azul de la patria y la tranquilidad del pueblo.
					
					Las fuerzas armadas consolidadas en la tempestad de la historia, seran tanto en el presente como en el futuro el remedio todopoderoso para preservar la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico y asegurar la victoria final de la Corea del Songun. 
					
					El ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu no observara con brazos cruzados la imprudencia de los enemigos. Si estos se atreven a atacarnos, acabaremos con todas las injusticias y los imperialistas yanquis y sus satelites y lograremos la victoria final. 
					
					Todos, unidos compactamente en torno al Comite Central del PTC encabezado por el Mariscal, deben luchar con dinamismo por la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista, la reunificacion independiente de la patria y el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche sosteniendo en alto la bandera del Songun.

articles.title: Minju Joson revela intencion malsana de sustitucion de administracion en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson revela intencion malsana de sustitucion de administracion en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Hace unos dias, en el Sur de Corea se realizo la sustitucion parcial del gobierno. Publicando la lista correspondiente, Chongwadae hablo tanto de "otro salto economico" y la "vida de los habitantes" como si corregiria algo en seguida.
					La presente sustitucion de las fuerzas conservadoras en Poder no pasa de ser una sofisteria de vampiros para chupar mas la sangre de los habitantes surcoreanos que estan en la situacion dificil por vida tan miserable.
					
					Asi inicia el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 29 y continua:
					
					El objetivo de esta farsa no persigue la resolucion del problema de la "activacion de la economia" y la "vida de los habitantes", sino el objeto de rehabilitar a toda costa la dictadura de "Yusin" al ganar sin falta la mayoria de escano en las elecciones parlamentarias de la "Asamblea Nacional" y alcanzar la ambicion de retoma del Poder aprovechando la division de las fuerzas de oposicion.
					
					Realmente, al mismo tiempo que realizo la reorganizacion de la administracion, el "Partido Saenuri" paso al sistema electoral antes que otros partidos politicos. No habra ningun cambio en la politica anti-popular de las autoridades conservadoras aunque fueran cambiadas las personalidades de alto rango de la administracion.
					
					Aunque "verifique" con frecuencia a los nuevos determinados, no se cambiara nada la naturaleza anti-popular de las autoridades surcoreanas. Mientras tales tipejos sigan tomando el Poder, no se mejoraran la vida de los habitantes surcoreanos.
